msg: more comprehensive modifier removal; remove (^|\b) idiom seen in T_KAM_STOCKTIP23; remove (?=[dehklnswxy]) idiom in HOT_NASTY; give up if anchors found; allow alternation/quantifiers to be enabled/disabled in code; ensure scoped idioms like (..braces..) are valid before output
